TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataSourceCacheExpiry extends System.Enum

summary.span: 描述逾時設定時使用 ASP.NET 快取機制之快取資料的到期方式。

span.span: Describes the way data cached using ASP.NET caching mechanisms expires when a time-out is set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉會說明如何快取的資料來源控制項的資料過期 ASP.NET 快取中。The enumeration describes how data cached by a data source control expires in the ASP.NET cache. ASP.NET 資料來源控制項會根據指定的逾時期限，它會設定使用 ASP.NET 快取中的資料快取`CacheDuration`屬性。An ASP.NET data source control caches data in the ASP.NET cache based on a specified time-out period, which is set using the `CacheDuration` property. 描述如何使用此逾時設定。The describes how this time-out setting is used. 如果到期原則設定為絕對值，當資料第一次快取後，會將傳遞指定的時間量將會捨棄快取的資料。If the expiration policy is set to Absolute, the cached data is discarded when the amount of time specified passes since the data was first cached. 如果設滑動期限原則，只有在指定時間內未使用的快取項目時，才將會捨棄快取的資料。If the expiration policy is set to Sliding, the cached data is discarded only when the cache entry has not been used for the amount of time specified. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用列舉型別宣告。The following code example demonstrates how to use the enumeration declaratively. 在此範例中，控制項用來顯示資料在控制項。In this example, a control is used to display data in a control. 控制項已啟用快取以及其設滑動，快取資料，只要沒有活動。The control has caching enabled and its set to Sliding, to cache data as long as there is activity. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_19sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_19sql/CS/sql19cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_19sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_19sql/VB/sql19vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry Absolute = int32(0)

summary.span: 自資料第一次快取以來， 屬性所指定的時間過後，快取資料會到期。

span.span: Cached data expires when the amount of time specified by the property has passed since the data was first cached.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry Sliding = int32(1)

summary.span: 只有在 指定的一段時間內，從未使用快取項目，快取資料才會到期。

span.span: Cached data expires only when the cache entry has not been used for the amount of time specified by the property.
